scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,app -c blue,green "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:app"
scripts.dev:remote: concurrently -n api,app -c blue,green "npm run dev:api:remote" "npm run dev:app"
scripts.db: cd worker && npx wrangler d1 execute iom-jobs --local
scripts.db:remote: cd worker && npx wrangler d1 execute iom-jobs --remote
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy && npm run deploy:app
